thread.title: Rankiteo Launches New Scoring Standard for the Cybersecurity Industry
thread.title_full: Rankiteo Launches New Scoring Standard for the Cybersecurity Industry

author: malvern-online.com
title: Rankiteo Launches New Scoring Standard for the Cybersecurity Industry
text:
Rankiteo, a cutting-edge cybersecurity startup, has officially launched its next-generation cybersecurity scoring standard, setting a new benchmark in the industry. With a strong emphasis on cyber insurance and third-party risk management (TPRM), Rankiteo is poised to challenge the long-standing dominance of SecurityScoreCard.com and redefine how companies assess their external cybersecurity posture.
A Game-Changer in Cybersecurity Scoring
Rankiteo is revolutionizing cybersecurity risk assessment by introducing an advanced scoring system that evaluates organizations from an insurer's perspective. With over 200 published research papers and 2,234 citations in cyber insurance research, Rankiteo has firmly established itself as a serious contender in the cybersecurity landscape.
“Our research and technological advancements have paved the way for us to become the leader in this market,” said Jeremy Canale, Founder of Rankiteo. “SecurityScoreCard now has a major competitor ready to take the lead. Our creative scoring method provides a complete approach to cyber risk assessment, therefore bridging the gap between cybersecurity and insurtech.”
Closing the Cybersecurity and Cyber Insurance Gap
Through a strong collection of tools and AI-driven insights catered for both insurers and businesses both, Rankiteo's SaaS-based platform provides unmatched cyber risk evaluation. The company's special emphasis on cyber insurance helps insurers to correctly evaluate a company's security posture and identify suitable coverage.
By means of real-time cybersecurity vulnerability analysis and risk evaluation streamlining, Rankiteo's AI agent is meant to lower the burden of cyber underwriters by 70%. Rankiteo distinguishes itself as the preferred platform for companies looking for a data-driven, automated method of cybersecurity assessment by integrating artificial intelligence with risk management.
Next-Generation TPRM with AI-Driven Insights
With a complete TPRM (Third-Party Risk Management) solution, Rankiteo guarantees companies can effectively monitor and control the cybersecurity risks connected with their suppliers and partners. Comprising more than forty modules, the platform addresses everything from cyber risk assessment and malware modeling to exploit prediction and vulnerability prioritizing.
The Rankiteo Scoring Cyber Platform is already being used by companies across various industries, including banking, insurance, finance, aerospace, healthcare, and more. To date, Rankiteo has successfully scored over 160 million companies, positioning itself as the only reliable source for external cybersecurity assessments.
Competing Head-to-Head with SecurityScoreCard
SecurityScoreCard has long been the market leader in cybersecurity scoring, but Rankiteo’s innovative methodologies and AI-powered approach are set to disrupt the status quo. Unlike traditional cybersecurity rating platforms, Rankiteo goes beyond static security assessments by integrating dynamic data analytics, real-time threat intelligence, and predictive modeling.
Rankiteo’s Key Differentiators:
-
AI-powered cyber insurance modeling that reduces underwriter workload by 70%
-
Over 200 research papers contributing to cybersecurity and cyber insurance
-
Peer Analytics for benchmarking cybersecurity posture against industry peers
-
Subsidiary integration to unify cybersecurity frameworks across organizations
-
Continuous assessment of infrastructure and application assets for proactive risk mitigation
Experience the Future of Cybersecurity with Rankiteo
Organizations looking to strengthen their cybersecurity posture and insurers seeking a data-driven approach to cyber risk management can now leverage Rankiteo’s advanced scoring platform. Rankiteo provides a free demo for businesses to experience its industry-leading technology firsthand.
To learn more about Rankiteo and explore its innovative cybersecurity solutions, visit www.rankiteo.com.
About Rankiteo
Rankiteo is a cybersecurity and insurtech startup specializing in next-generation cyber risk assessment and scoring. With a strong emphasis on AI-driven risk modeling and cyber insurance, Rankiteo provides businesses and insurers with the most accurate cybersecurity ratings and analytics. Headquartered in London, UK, Rankiteo is reshaping the future of cybersecurity by bridging the gap between digital security and risk underwriting.
For updates, follow Rankiteo on LinkedIn.
